item.title: Startups: Codian
item.description: Introduction I’ve spent most of my career in startups which would go on to be acquired by Cisco (twice). As a cheap form of therapy, I’m collecting some of my “learnings” here. Ancient History I joined Codian in the summer of 2006. I was nearing completion of my PhD, had a one-year old child and far too much student debt. I’d decided that I didn’t want to follow an academic career.
